resume_text:
Abhishek Jha
♂phone6289716964 |/envel⌢pejhaa213152@gmail.com |/linkedinlinkedin.com/abhishek |/githubgithub.com/abhishek |/codeleetcode.com/abhishek

Shree Jain Vidyalaya kolkata

Hind Motor High School kolkata
Secondary Education Mar 2019
Experience
Twowaits Technologies March 2024 – May 2024
Technical Content Writer Remote
•Conceptualized comprehensive technical content on Data Structures and Algorithms concepts.
•Created dry run pictorial examples to clarify concepts, using different shapes, canvas, and related tools for visual
representation.
•Collaborated with technical writers, editors, and subject matter experts to ensure the accuracy, consistency, and
quality of all written materials.
Projects
Laundry Utility |React Native, React, Express, Firebase, Redux ♂share-square June 2024 – August 2024
•Developed a laundry service platform with payment integration using React Native for the mobile app and React.js
for the website, featuring item selection, address input, date and time scheduling with real-time validation
•Implemented Firebase for authentication and Express for a robust backend
•Used Redux Toolkit for efficient state management and Tailwind CSS to create a responsive, modern UI that
enhances usability and visual appeal
Youtube Sentiment Analysis |Flask, Youtube Data API, React, VADER Library ♂share-square Dec 2023 – Mar 2024
•Implemented a sentiment analysis on YouTube video comments, where users enter a video URL to receive an
analysis of the total number of comments, including positive and negative comments
•Used VADER sentiment analysis to evaluate YouTube comments with 90% accuracy, providing sentiment insights
via the YouTube API
•Built a robust backend using Flask and React.js for the frontend
Background Removerl |React, Removebg API ♂share-square Apr 2023 – June 2023
•Developed a user-friendly React.js interface for automated image background removal, focusing on reusable
components and a robust design, achieving a 90% reduction in background removal errors
•Showcased frontend development and API integration skills with DOM manipulation and React hooks, enhancing
UI engagement and increasing user retention rates by 25%
Skills
Programming : Java, SQL, JavaScript, Python
Development : React Js, React Native, HTML, CSS, Express.js, Firebase, Tailwind CSS
CS Fundamentals : Data Structure & Algorithms, Object Oriented Programming, DBMS, Computer Networks
Accomplishments
Scored 3325 rank out of 34697 in biweekly contest 135.
Solved more than 500 questions on various coding platforms.
Interest & Hobbies
Video Editing
Reading
Cricket

conversation.content:
Hello Abhishek, nice to meet you.  Thanks for your time.

Your resume shows experience with React and React Native.  Can you tell me about a challenging problem you faced while working on your Laundry Utility project?

technicalSkills.assessment: Abhishek demonstrates familiarity with React, React Native, Express, Firebase, and Redux, based on his Laundry Utility project.  The interview only scratched the surface of his technical skills, however.  The lack of detail regarding the challenging problem he faced in the Laundry Utility project prevents a thorough evaluation of his depth of understanding and problem-solving abilities within these frameworks. His resume mentions content writing focused on Data Structures and Algorithms, suggesting a potential breadth of knowledge beyond frontend development, but this was not explored during the provided interview snippet.

communicationSkills.assessment: The provided interview snippet is too short to fully assess Abhishek's communication skills.  While the greeting suggests politeness, we lack information on his ability to articulate technical concepts clearly and concisely, handle difficult questions, and engage in a professional and engaging conversation. More information is needed.

problemSolvingAbilities.assessment: This area is also hampered by the limited interview data.  The interviewer asked about a challenging problem, but Abhishek's response is missing. This makes it impossible to evaluate his analytical skills, debugging abilities, or his approach to complex issues.  His project experience suggests problem-solving capabilities, but concrete evidence is lacking.

culturalFit.assessment: Based solely on the brief interaction, Abhishek appears polite and professional.  However, assessing cultural fit requires a more extensive interview process, exploring team collaboration, work style preferences, and alignment with the company culture. The provided data is not sufficient for a meaningful evaluation.

strengths: Experience with a range of popular technologies (React, React Native, Express, Firebase, Redux)
Experience in technical content writing, demonstrating understanding and communication of technical concepts (although the depth isn't clear from the snippet)
Project portfolio indicating practical application of skills (though detailed project descriptions are absent)
weaknesses: Lack of detail provided about his project experience, making it difficult to assess technical proficiency and problem-solving skills fully.
Limited interview interaction preventing a comprehensive evaluation of communication and problem-solving skills, and cultural fit.

overallImpression.assessment: Abhishek shows promise, possessing a solid foundation in relevant technologies. However, the limited interview excerpt prevents a definitive assessment of his abilities. A more in-depth conversation is needed to evaluate his technical expertise, problem-solving skills, and communication abilities effectively.  The current information only provides a superficial view.

recommendationsForImprovement: Expand on project details in the resume and during future interviews.  Quantify achievements whenever possible (e.g., 'Improved app load times by 20%').
Practice articulating complex technical topics in a clear and concise manner, using appropriate examples.
Prepare for behavioral interview questions, such as those focusing on challenging projects and problem-solving approaches.
Develop a stronger personal narrative around career aspirations and goals to strengthen the overall interview impression.
